venue.address_1: East Broadway, between I and L Streets
venue.name: South Boston

item.description:
This Meetup is organized together with the new Meetup "For the fun of it!" http://www.meetup.com/Weekend-fun/

http://www.southbostonstreetfestival.com

Live entertainment on 2 stages

• Over 100 Local Merchants, Artists and Organizations

 
Great Food • Dance Performances • Children’s Activities • Pooch Friendly

 
Meet Boston Bruins Legends Terry O’Reilly & Rick Middleton

 

 

The festival is located on East Broadway between I and L Streets.

Parking: There are no off street public parking lots in the immediate vicinity of the Festival site.

There is FREE but limited on street parking available in the neighborhood surrounding the Festival (The resident only parking restriction is not enforced on Saturdays)

Please observe all other parking restrictions. Bicycles: Bicycle racks will be located at each end of the festival site.

Bicycles and Skateboards are not allowed into the Festival site. Public Transportation Bus: The festival site is serviced by the following MBTA bus routes: #5, #7, #9 #10. These buses will be detoured around the festival site and resume at East Broadway & L Street (the foot of the Festival site) where you should disembark. Subway: Red line to Broadway T station and board #9 Bus (City Point) outbound.

 

I will be at South Station at 12PM. and I want to walk from there. I'll email my cell phone on Friday night.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: South Boston Street Festival
